name: fibroid
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a mass of muscle and fibrous (= thread-like) tissue that forms inside someone's body, usually inside the uterus (= the part of the body where a baby grows): In most cases, fibroids are harmless and symptom-free. During her pregnancy, an ultrasound scan showed she had fibroids.
More examplesFewer examplesIrregular bleeding can be caused by uterine fibroids.Various factors appear to influence a woman's risk of developing fibroids.The procedure is used for smaller fibroids and is minimally invasive.Doctors can use hormones to shrink fibroids.I had to have a hysterectomy because of fibroids in my womb.
